mapper.select: SELECT lecture_no lectureNo, account_id accountId, attendance_day attendanceDay, attendance_createdate attendanceCreatedate, attendance_updatedate attendanceUpdatedate, attendance_state attendanceState, attendance_remark attendanceRemark FROM attendance WHERE account_id = #{accountId} AND lecture_no = #{lectureNo} AND YEAR(attendance_day) = #{currentYear} AND MONTH(attendance_day) = #{currentMonth}

SELECT IFNULL(ROUND((COUNT(*)/s.subject_totalday * 100), 1),0) rating FROM subject s JOIN lecture l ON s.subject_no = l.lecture_no JOIN attendance a ON a.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE a.attendance_state = '출석' AND a.account_id = #{accountId} AND a.lecture_no = #{lectureNo}
